import React, {useRef} from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {Container, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' import {ArrowLeft, ArrowRight} from '@material-ui/icons' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' export const MainSlider = () => { const slider = useRef({ slickNext() { }, slickPrev() { } }); const next = () => slider.current.slickNext(); const previous = () => slider.current.slickPrev(); const classes = useStyles(); return (
) };
